City Council
============

The City Council meets on the 2nd and 4th Monday of the month, excluding holidays and special circumstances. Agendas are posted at least 72 hours before the scheduled meeting at the City Hall Municipal Complex and on the City website. Minutes are posted, once approved by the City Council, after the subsequent council meeting.

Meetings can be viewed live on Charter Spectrum Cable Channel 190. They may also be [live-streamed](https://www.haltomcitytx.com/cc-live). Meetings are also uploaded to our [Vimeo page](https://vimeo.com/showcase/haltom-city-council) for viewing at any time. For concise, easy-to-read summaries of recent City Council meetings, click City Council Meeting Summaries.

If you have any questions, please contact the City Secretary's Office at 817-222-7749.

[City Council Contact Form](https://haltomcitytx.formstack.com/forms/city_council_contact_form)

### Meetings

* 7:00 p.m. (Work Sessions start at 6:00 p.m.)
* 2nd and 4th Monday of every month
* Council Chambers ([City Hall - 4801 Haltom Rd. | Haltom City, TX. 76117](https://www.haltomcitytx.com/Facilities/Facility/Details/City-Hall-14))

### Elected Members

* Mayor - An Truong
* Place 1 - Lin Thompson
* Place 2 - Kyle Hantz
* Place 3 - Ollie Anderson
* Place 4 - Scott Lindgren
* Place 5 - Troy Dunn
* Place 6 - Dana Coffman
* Place 7 - Don Cooper

* [City Council Meeting Summaries](https://www.haltomcitytx.com/644/City-Council-Meeting-Summaries)

### Agendas & Minutes

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.  
[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.haltomcitytx.com/AgendaCenter/City-Council-17)
